response.overview: A teenager lost in distraction, crushed by expectations and haunted by guilt, spirals into self-doubtâ€”until a harsh wake-up call from his father sparks a surreal inner battle. The Renewal is a psychological short that blends emotion and symbolism, where a dusty book, ghostly figures, and a broken boy collide in a fight to reclaim purpose.
response.tagline: Haunted by self! Saved by purpose!
response.title: The Renewal
